name: Knockdown the Ball
description: Guide the ball and complete the levels
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher Processor: Any processor, 32-bit available Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Any 1 GB moderate display card DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX Supported
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher Processor: Any processor, 32-bit available Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Any 2 GB moderate video card DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 600 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX Supported
